SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class SettingLoader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.SettingLoader
public class SettingLoader extends Object
This class provides methods to load the settings of the game from the JSON files and the properties file. It also provides methods to create the decks of the game.

    • loadSpecificPersonalGoal

      public static PersonalGoal loadSpecificPersonalGoal(int randomPersonalGoalIndex) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Loads the settings of the common goals from the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      randomPersonalGoalIndex - the index of the personal goal to be loaded
      Returns:
      the complete common goal deck
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the file is not in JSON format
